disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 23 May to end of Monday 23 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Cooler weather for Monday as a westerly breeze strengthens during the day. Little imported pollution is expected on this maritime air path, with good dispersion locally too.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 24 May to end of Tuesday 24 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Plenty of cloud around throughout Tuesday with light rain showers and sunny intervals.<br/><br/>A light relatively 'clean' westerly breeze should ensure good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
